content.question: A cylindrical container is partially filled with water of density <math alttext="rho sub w" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>w</mi></msub></mstyle></math>. The force that the water exerts on the bottom of the container is <math alttext="F sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>. A piece of copper of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> and density <math alttext="rho sub copper is greater than rho sub w" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Cu</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>w</mi></msub></mstyle></math> is suspended from a string and lowered into the water until all of the copper but none of the string is submerged. The copper does not touch the bottom or sides of the container and no water spills over the sides of the container when the copper is submerged. Which of the following expressions is equal to <math alttext="F sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>, the force that the water exerts on the bottom of the container while the copper is submerged?

choices.label: <math alttext="F sub 1 plus m g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F sub 1 minus the fraction with numerator rho sub w, end sub, m g, and denominator rho sub copper" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>w</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Cu</mtext></msub></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F sub 1 plus the fraction with numerator rho sub w, end sub, m g, and denominator rho sub copper" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>w</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Cu</mtext></msub></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="F sub 1 plus the fraction with numerator rho sub w, end sub, m g, and denominator rho sub copper" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>w</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Cu</mtext></msub></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
